text: Xiongying Zheng is a Chinese sitting volleyball player. She played at the 2004 Summer Paralympics, winning a gold medal, 2008 Summer Paralympics, winning a gold medal, and 2012 Summer Paralympics, winning a gold medal. == References == == Other websites== * Zheng Xiongying of Team China celebrates zimbio Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Chinese sitting volleyball players Category:Paralympic gold medalists for China
title: Xiongying Zheng
